name: Campaign Leads Summary
query:
SELECT 
    COALESCE(CASE 
        WHEN %(group_by)s = 'Login Status' THEN login_status 
        WHEN %(group_by)s = 'Lead Type' THEN lead_type 
        WHEN %(group_by)s = 'Data Source' THEN data_source 
        WHEN %(group_by)s = 'Lead Status' THEN lead_status 
        WHEN %(group_by)s = 'Campaign Type' THEN campaign_type 
        WHEN %(group_by)s = 'Campaign Date' THEN campaign_date 
        WHEN %(group_by)s = 'Response Date' THEN cr_date 
        WHEN %(group_by)s = 'City' THEN city
    END, 'Unknown') AS group_value,
    COUNT(*) AS `No of Leads`
FROM tabBlasting
WHERE (%(lead_status)s IS NULL OR %(lead_status)s = '' OR lead_status = %(lead_status)s OR %(lead_status)s = 'All Lead Status')
AND (
    %(month_filter)s IS NULL OR 
    %(month_filter)s = 'None' OR 
    (CASE 
        WHEN %(month_filter)s = 'All Months' THEN campaign_date BETWEEN '2024-01-01' AND '2040-12-31'
        WHEN %(month_filter)s = 'Sep- 24' THEN campaign_date BETWEEN '2024-09-01' AND '2024-09-30'
        WHEN %(month_filter)s = 'Oct- 24' THEN campaign_date BETWEEN '2024-10-01' AND '2024-10-31'
        WHEN %(month_filter)s = 'Nov- 24' THEN campaign_date BETWEEN '2024-11-01' AND '2024-11-30'
        WHEN %(month_filter)s = 'Dec- 24' THEN campaign_date BETWEEN '2024-12-01' AND '2024-12-31'
        WHEN %(month_filter)s = 'Jan- 25' THEN campaign_date BETWEEN '2025-01-01' AND '2025-01-31'
        WHEN %(month_filter)s = 'Feb- 25' THEN campaign_date BETWEEN '2024-02-01' AND '2024-02-29'
        WHEN %(month_filter)s = 'Mar- 25' THEN campaign_date BETWEEN '2024-03-01' AND '2024-03-31'
        WHEN %(month_filter)s = 'Apr- 25' THEN campaign_date BETWEEN '2024-04-01' AND '2024-04-30'
        WHEN %(month_filter)s = 'May- 25' THEN campaign_date BETWEEN '2024-05-01' AND '2024-05-31'
        WHEN %(month_filter)s = 'Jun- 25' THEN campaign_date BETWEEN '2024-06-01' AND '2024-06-30'
        WHEN %(month_filter)s = 'Jul- 25' THEN campaign_date BETWEEN '2024-07-01' AND '2024-07-31'
        WHEN %(month_filter)s = 'Aug- 25' THEN campaign_date BETWEEN '2024-08-01' AND '2024-08-31'    
    END)
)
GROUP BY group_value
ORDER BY `No of Leads` DESC;
